sentences.en: A faint aroma of coffee attracted his attention.
sentences.cn: 淡淡的咖啡香味一下子吸引了他。

sentences.en: a faint hope that they might be alive
sentences.cn: 他们渺茫的生还希望

sentences.en: A faint smile crossed his lips.
sentences.cn: 他嘴唇上掠过一丝微笑。

sentences.en: A faint smile of reminiscence appeared on her face..
sentences.cn: 一丝怀旧的微笑浮现在她的脸上。

sentences.en: a very faint noise
sentences.cn: 很微弱的声响

sentences.en: Afterwards, retrospective fear of the responsibility would make her feel almost faint.
sentences.cn: 后来，回想起要负的责任她几乎会吓晕过去。

sentences.en: Caroline made a faint attempt at a laugh.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳敷衍地笑了一下。

sentences.en: Don't be faint-hearted when things seem a bit slow or boring.
sentences.cn: 事情变得有点沉闷无聊的时候，不要胆怯。

sentences.en: Faint glimmers of daylight were showing through the treetops.
sentences.cn: 微弱的日光从树梢中透出。

sentences.en: He became aware of the soft, faint sounds of water dripping.
sentences.cn: 他开始注意到轻微的水滴声。

sentences.en: He kept thinking the pain was such that he would faint.
sentences.cn: 他不停地想太疼了，他会疼昏过去了。

sentences.en: He stopped to try to adjust his vision to the faint starlight.
sentences.cn: 他停下脚步试着让眼睛适应微弱的星光。

sentences.en: He was conscious of the faint, musky aroma of after-shave.
sentences.cn: 他意识到剃须后有淡淡的麝香味。

sentences.en: His breathing became faint.
sentences.cn: 他的呼吸变得微弱了。

sentences.en: I faint at the sight of blood.
sentences.cn: 我一见到血就晕。

sentences.en: I haven't the faintest what it means.
sentences.cn: 我完全不懂这是什么意思。

sentences.en: Other signs of angina are nausea, sweating, feeling faint and shortness of breath.
sentences.cn: 心绞痛的其他征兆是恶心、出汗、感觉虚弱晕眩和气短。

sentences.en: Several fans fainted in the blazing heat.
sentences.cn: 几个球迷在炽热高温下晕过去了。

sentences.en: She gave a faint smile.
sentences.cn: 她淡淡一笑。

sentences.en: She slumped to the ground in a faint.
sentences.cn: 她一阵晕眩，跌倒在地。

sentences.en: the faint light of dawn
sentences.cn: 微弱的晨光

sentences.en: The heat made him feel quite faint.
sentences.cn: 高温令他感觉很虚弱。

sentences.en: The room held the faint, sweet odour of pipe tobacco.
sentences.cn: 房间内有烟斗烟丝的淡淡馨香。

sentences.en: This is no time to be faint-hearted.
sentences.cn: 现在不是怯懦的时候。

phrases.tran_cn: 由于…原因而衰弱；因…而昏厥
(非正式)一点也不知道（或不明白）

trans.tran_cn: 微弱的，暗淡的，敷衍的，晕眩的
trans.tran_en: difficult to see, hear, smell etc
to suddenly become unconscious for a short time
to suddenly become unconscious for a short time
to suddenly become unconscious for a short time
